name: meterror
description:
Meterror is a game where you control a meteor which lands on a proceduraly generated planet. Your goal is to destroy as many buildings as you can before you cool down and continue to the next level.

However you must be careful of you temperature, which is your health. The native people, known as capsules, set up dangerous water towers and water silos which lowers your temperature. You can gain temperature back by causing destruction or by rolling over a smiths. Other dangers awaits, such as wind mills which might push you off to the lakes or off the planet.

Download the game, join the destruction, and earn the highest score today!

This game was made by 5 students in a span of 5 weeks in the summer game dev competition 2019 and won the Jury Award.

  • Peter Pápay - programming
  • Dominik Števlík – programming
  • Maroš Seidmann – 3d assets
  • Vladyslav Rudenko – 3d assets
  • Elly Friedmann – 2d assets
